plot: It's Christmas in Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Mr. Rogers wishes his neighbors a merry Christmas, while in the Neighborhood of Make Believe, all the neighbors exchange gifts with each other...
title: Christmastime with Mister Rogers
plot_es: It's Christmas in Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Mr. Rogers wishes his neighbors a merry Christmas, while in the Neighborhood of Make Believe, all the neighbors exchange gifts with each other...
plot_en: It's Christmas in Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Mr. Rogers wishes his neighbors a merry Christmas, while in the Neighborhood of Make Believe, all the neighbors exchange gifts with each other...
